segments.text: Hi , there ’ s a problem with this stereo . I ’ d like to return it , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The tape player doesn ’ t work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: O . K . Do you have your receipt ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . Do you want your money back , or would you like to exchange it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think I ’ d like to just get another stereo , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: O . K . Here ’ s a receipt for store credit . Just take it back to the stereo section and one of our salesmen will help you .
segments.speaker: S2
